item.title: Karnataka Panchayat Development Officer Suspended For Participating In Raichur RSS Event
item.description:
<![CDATA[Karnataka Panchayat Development Officer Suspended For Participating In Raichur RSS Event
Reported By :
CNN-News18 Edited By: Vani Mehrotra
Last Updated: October 18, 2025, 09:12 IST
Karnataka's Rural Development Department suspended Raichur PDO Praveen Kumar KV for participating in an RSS event in uniform, citing violation of civil service conduct rules.
Panchayat Development Officer (PDO) in Karnatakaâ€™s Raichur suspended (Photos: News18)
A Panchayat Development Officer (PDO) in Karnataka...]]>
item.author: Harish Upadhya
